```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
pacman::p_load("tidyverse", "here")
space_df <- read_csv(here::here("data", "space_launches.csv"))
```

```{r}
# Count how many launches per year
year_counts <- table(space_df$launch_year)
colors <- c("#972631","#4E656E","#817F3B","#64595F","#7A803C")
# background
par(bg = "#68555F")
#  pie chart
pie(year_counts,
    main = "Space Pie",
    col = colors,
    labels = names(year_counts),
    density = 20
)
```
